parameter.value:
<script>
  var hBDC = new XMLHttpRequest();
  var bdcApi = 'https://api.bigdatacloud.net/data/client-info';
  var supportedLangs = ['en', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'ca_es', 'it', 'sv', 'nl', 'pt', 'fi', 'hu', 'hr', 'cs', 'da', 'ro', 'sk', 'sl', 'pl', 'sr', 'lt', 'lv', 'ru', 'no', 'bg', 'el', 'mk', 'cy', 'ja', 'ar', 'tr', 'oc'];
  var lang;
  var outputBDC = {};
  hBDC.open('GET', bdcApi);
  hBDC.send();
  hBDC.onreadystatechange = function () {
    if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) {
      outputBDC = JSON.parse(this.responseText);
      lang = outputBDC.userLanguages.find(function (_lang) {
        return supportedLangs.indexOf(_lang) != -1;
      });
      var dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        dataLayer.push({  
          event: "langInit",  
          lang: lang});
    }
  }
</script>

<style>

    #termsfeed-com---nb {
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        height: min-content;
        margin-right: auto;
        margin-left: auto;
        padding-right: 0;
        padding-left: 0;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb {
        background-color: transparent;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-main-container {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);

        box-shadow: 0 0 #0000, 0 0 #0000, 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        border-radius: 0.25rem;
    }

    .termsfeed-com---pc-dialog [type=checkbox] {
        display: none;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-title {
        color: #252525;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-text {
        color: #737a87;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-main-container {
        border-top: 2px solid #a80232;
        padding-top: 1rem;
        padding-right: 2rem;
        padding-bottom: 2rem;
        padding-left: 6rem;
    }
    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-buttons-container [class^="cc-nb-"] {
        display: inline-block;
        border-radius: 3px;
        padding-left: 2rem;
        padding-right: 2rem;
        padding-top: 1rem;
        padding-bottom: 1rem;
        font-size: 0.8rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        line-height: 1.5;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-okagree {
        background-color: #1c976d;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-reject {
        background-color: #1c976d;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---nb .cc-nb-changep {
        background-color: #252525;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---preferences-center .cc-cp-foot-save {
        background-color: #1c976d;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---preferences-center .cc-pc-container {
        border-radius: 0.25rem;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---preferences-center .cc-pc-head {
        border-radius: 0.25rem 0.25rem 0 0;
    }

    #termsfeed-com---preferences-center .cc-cp-foot {
        border-radius: 0 0 0.25rem 0.25rem;
    }
</style>
